TopicTitle: For Those of You Who Want Clouds....

Articles.Content:
... the game already HAS clouds! I should know, I crashed into them!

I always knew that clouds were full of rocks.
Clouds of smoke from all the explosions.

Actually clouds of gas from Jool's atmosphere... Was the longest ever crash I have been in because the darn rocket kept slowing down and slowing down as the atmosphere got thicker and thicker. To be honest I would have thought the thing would have melted under the amount of temperature and pressure it was going through. Luckily for the Kerbals, it was an unmanned (or unkerballed) probe.

First time I've been to Jool (been putting it off as I wanted to limit myself to one new planet per upgrade to keep it new.

Oh wow, I wonder when they added this scenario to the flight results screen. Is it new to 0.20. Because I'm pretty sure it never came up the hundreds of times I crashed Kerbals into Jool in previous versions *evil smile*
